attributes.action: Allow organised grassroots sports for children during November lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Children's health and well-being is best when allowed to be active. Some need team sports to motivate themselves to be active.
attributes.background: Allow training sessions and matches to occur for children at grassroots level

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557785
